mapper.select: SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_info, address, phone_number, email, is_active FROM MASTER_SUPPLIER ORDER BY supplier_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MASTER_SUPPLIER (supplier_name, contact_info, address, phone_number, email, is_active) VALUES (#{supplierName}, #{contactInfo}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE MASTER_SUPPLIER SET supplier_name = #{supplierName}, contact_info = #{contactInfo}, address = #{address}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email}, is_active = #{isActive} WHERE supplier_id = #{supplierId}
